message.name: ERR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The attribute name %1s is too long. Maximum allowed is %2n characters.

message.name: ERR_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value of attribute %1s is too long. Maximum allowed is %2n characters.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EVIDENCE_DATA
message.locale: The evidence data record that owns this attribute is mandatory and must be set.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EVIDENCE_TYPE_VERSION_DEFINITION
message.locale: Evidence type version definition is mandatory and must be set on an evidence record.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_EVIDENCE_DATA_IDENTIFIER
message.locale: The evidence data record identifier is mandatory.

message.name: ERR_NO_VERSION_NO
message.locale: The version number must be set in order to modify evidence record.
